name: TURTLNATOR
description:
A game about patience and a turtle who wants to be free.

This game was created for the GMTK Game Jam 2020.

The theme is "Out of Control", made in 2 days.

Controls:

Shoot with [left mouse button].

Open pause menu with [p] or [esc] or  [right mouse button].

Music from:

https://onemansymphony.bandcamp.com/
